SEARCH
Package com.example.TaskManagement.controllers

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
com.example.TaskManagement.controllers.TaskController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class TaskController extends Object
Controller for managing tasks in the application. This class handles requests related to tasks, including retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting tasks, as well as modifying task statuses and priorities. It also enforces authorization using security annotations.

  • Method Details

    • getTaskById

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @GetMapping("/tasks/{taskId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskResponseDTO> getTaskById(@PathVariable Long taskId)
      Retrieves a task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the task details if found, or a NOT_FOUND status if the task does not exist

    • getAllTasksAuthor

      @GetMapping("/users/{author}/allTasksOfAuthor") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Collection<TaskResponseDTO>> getAllTasksAuthor(@PathVariable String author, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves all tasks assigned to a specific author, with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      author - the username of the author whose tasks are to be retrieved
      page - the page number to retrieve (default is 0)
      size - the number of tasks per page (default is 10)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of task DTOs

    • getAllTasksExecutor

      @GetMapping("/users/{executor}/allTasksOfExecutor") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Collection<TaskResponseDTO>> getAllTasksExecutor(@PathVariable String executor, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves all tasks assigned to a specific executor, with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      executor - the username of the executor whose tasks are to be retrieved
      page - the page number to retrieve (default is 0)
      size - the number of tasks per page (default is 10)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of task DTOs

    • createTask

      @PostMapping("/tasks") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> createTask(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid TaskRequestDTO taskRequestDto)
      Creates a new task.
      Parameters:
      taskRequestDto - the task data to be created
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • updateTask

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @PutMapping("/tasks/{taskId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateTask(@PathVariable Long taskId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid TaskRequestDTO taskRequestDto)
      Updates an existing task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to be updated
      taskRequestDto - the updated task data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • deleteTask

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @DeleteMapping("/tasks/{taskId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteTask(@PathVariable Long taskId)
      Deletes a task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • updateStatusCompleted

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkExecutorRole(#taskId, authentication.name) || @taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @PatchMapping("/tasks/{taskId}/status/completed") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateStatusCompleted(@PathVariable Long taskId)
      Updates the status of a task to "COMPLETED".
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to update
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • updateStatusInProcess

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkExecutorRole(#taskId, authentication.name) || @taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @PatchMapping("/tasks/{taskId}/status/in-process") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateStatusInProcess(@PathVariable Long taskId)
      Updates the status of a task to "IN_PROCESS".
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to update
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

    • updateExecutor

      @PreAuthorize("@taskSecurityService.checkAuthorRole(#taskId, authentication.name)") @PatchMapping("/tasks/{taskId}/{executorName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateExecutor(@PathVariable Long taskId, @PathVariable String executorName)
      Updates the executor for a task.
      Parameters:
      taskId - the ID of the task to update
      executorName - the new executor's name
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation
